players.name: Alice

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso, be cautious. Who else do you suspect?"
You: "Investigate Diana and Charlie. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Will prove my innocence. Investigate Bob next."
Charlie: "Investigating Bob next. Stay vigilant."
You: "Investigating Diana and Charlie. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Investigating Bob next. Stay cautious."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso, be cautious. Who else do you suspect?"
Bob: "Investigate Diana and Charlie. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Will prove my innocence. Investigate Bob next."
You: "Investigating Bob next. Stay vigilant."
Bob: "Investigating Diana and Charlie. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Investigating Bob next. Stay cautious."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
